casebody.data:
Alvin B. BYRD, Employee
v.
ECOFIBERS, INC., Employer and
Hartford Insurance Company, Carrier. No. 229P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2007. Lawrence J. Goldman, Charlotte, for Ecofibers, et al. Cecil Lee Porter, North Wilkesboro, for Byrd. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 645 S.E.2d 80 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 15th day of May 2007 by Defendants in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd day of August 2007."
